channel.title: Memory2006 - Coming soon
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/526/2u6g4lz.png/][IMG]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/7922/2u6g4lz.png[/img][/URL]
This project was started on the [b]30th of November 2012[/b] by Mod Vult. We are called Memory2006.
[b]The Team:[/b]
• Mod Vult - Lead Developer and Owner of Memory2006.
[b]What I've fixed from the Original:[/b]
• Duplication glitch. • General bugs and glitches. •Doors. •Crafting. • Bones to bananas. • Bones to peaches. • Making pottery. • The shops didn't sell the correct thing in Varrock (e.g the General Store sold bulk cannons and I fixed it to normal). • Working on Doric's. • Talisman Locating.
[b]Latest updates:[/b]
• Added titles for different staff such as doing "::yell" as Moderator it would show "[MODERATOR] Mod Vult: Hello Moparscape!" in the color set. • Working on fixing NPC conversations in Varrock. • Fixed very simple and easy duplication glitch. • Looking to fill in the rest of the development team slots. • Tutorial Island has been started. • Project has been launched and directed into Private Testing.
The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The[b] orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
• PvP fully complete. • PvN fully complete. • Perfect max hit formulas. • Perfect accuracy formula. • Equipment requirements. • Special Attacks.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
• Colored spell-book. • Requirements for teleporting and casting spells. • Modern spells. • Alching. • Runes required to cast or teleport.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
• Bows/arrows • Can't shoot through walls • Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal) • Special attacks.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
• All bones bury-able. [color=orange]• All prayers working properly.[/color] • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
• Emptying and refilling rocks. • All ores can be mined. • Correct pickaxe finding and animations. • Prospecting. • Random chance of obtaining gems. • Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
• Stumps and regrowing trees. • Correct hatchet finding. • Correct hatchet animations. • All trees cut-able.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/11/2553638.gif/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/2646/2553638.gif[/img][/URL] [b]Tutorial Island progress[/b]
• Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor. • Cooking instructor. [color=orange]• Correct hint arrows.[/color] • Quest instructor. • Mining/Smithing instructor. • Combat instructor. • Money instructor. • Prayer instructor. • Magic instructor. [color=green]• Doors.[/color]
----------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Rest being added over-time.[/b]
----------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Pictures of Memory2006:[/b]
Fully working and coded mining. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/163/fullyworkingmining.png/][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/561/fullyworkingmining.png[/img][/URL]
Fully working pickables in Camelot and many other places. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/5/workingpickablesincamel.png/][IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/2172/workingpickablesincamel.png[/img][/URL]
Argougne with all NPCs trade-able and fully working. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/248/ardougnewithpictures.png/][IMG]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/6402/ardougnewithpictures.png[/img][/URL]
Default NPCs that aren't coded say the a certain phrase until coded. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/838/defaultuncodednpctext.png/][IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/6429/defaultuncodednpctext.png[/img][/URL]
Cook's Assistant fully working. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/32/sassistant.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/8638/sassistant.png[/img][/URL]
Falador with Guards, Bankers and other things all ready to be used. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/690/faladorwithpictures.png/][IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/3292/faladorwithpictures.png[/img][/URL]
Tutorial Island, currently being coded. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/837/tutisland.png/][IMG]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/9230/tutisland.png[/img][/URL]
Default spell-book with good looking colors. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/835/spellbookwithcolours.png/][IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/4316/spellbookwithcolours.png[/img][/URL]
----------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
• Mod Vult (me). • Project Insanity or PI. • Matt • i am infamy
----------------------------------------------------------------

I’m not able to give a link but Use the search button :s
(Btw had to quit dutchreality because of irl problems.)

item.title: Memory2006 - Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

[center]

This project was started on the 30th of November 2012 by Mod Vult.
We are called Memory2006.

The Team:

• Mod Vult - Lead Developer and Owner of Memory2006.

What I’ve fixed from the Original:

• Duplication glitch.
• General bugs and glitches.
•Doors.
•Crafting.
• Bones to bananas.
• Bones to peaches.
• Making pottery.
• The shops didn’t sell the correct thing in Varrock (e.g the General Store sold bulk cannons and I fixed it to normal).
• Working on Doric’s.
• Talisman Locating.

Latest updates:

• Added titles for different staff such as doing “::yell” as Moderator it would show “[MODERATOR] Mod Vult: Hello Moparscape!” in the color set.
• Working on fixing NPC conversations in Varrock.
• Fixed very simple and easy duplication glitch.
• Looking to fill in the rest of the development team slots.
• Tutorial Island has been started.
• Project has been launched and directed into Private Testing.

The red color code means the feature has not yet been started.
The orange color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The green color code means the feature has been finished.


Combat

• PvP fully complete.
• PvN fully complete.
• Perfect max hit formulas.
• Perfect accuracy formula.
• Equipment requirements.
• Special Attacks.


Magic

• Colored spell-book.
• Requirements for teleporting and casting spells.
• Modern spells.
• Alching.
• Runes required to cast or teleport.


Ranged

• Bows/arrows
• Can’t shoot through walls
• Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
• Special attacks.


Prayer

• All bones bury-able.
[color=orange]• All prayers working properly.[/color]
• Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate.


Mining

• Emptying and refilling rocks.
• All ores can be mined.
• Correct pickaxe finding and animations.
• Prospecting.
• Random chance of obtaining gems.
• Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms.


Woodcutting

• Stumps and regrowing trees.
• Correct hatchet finding.
• Correct hatchet animations.
• All trees cut-able.


Tutorial Island progress

• Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor.
• Cooking instructor.
[color=orange]• Correct hint arrows.[/color]
• Quest instructor.
• Mining/Smithing instructor.
• Combat instructor.
• Money instructor.
• Prayer instructor.
• Magic instructor.
[color=green]• Doors.[/color]

Rest being added over-time.

Pictures of Memory2006:

Fully working and coded mining.

Fully working pickables in Camelot and many other places.

Argougne with all NPCs trade-able and fully working.

Default NPCs that aren’t coded say the a certain phrase until coded.

Cook’s Assistant fully working.

Falador with Guards, Bankers and other things all ready to be used.

Tutorial Island, currently being coded.

Default spell-book with good looking colors.

Credits:

• Mod Vult (me).
• Project Insanity or PI.
• Matt
• i am infamy

Read full topic
